message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I think it's a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I need to make sure it's within my budget.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I can't go lower than $130.  This product is high-quality and worth the investment.
I understand the product is high-quality, but I'm still a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $125, but I need to make sure it's the best price I can get.
